info.title: Currency API
info.description:
### Currency
The Currency object and endpoints manage alternate currency display options on the storefront.

is_default.description: Specifies whether this is the store’s default currency display format and may only be adjusted in the control panel. READ-ONLY

last_updated.description: Date the currency was last updated, created or modified.

country_iso2.description: 2-letter ISO Alpha-2 code for this currency’s country.

currency_exchange_rate.description: Amount of this currency that is equivalent to one U.S. dollar.(Float, Float as String, Integer)

auto_update.description: Specifies whether to use the Open Exchange Rates service to update the currency conversion. A value of false specifies a static conversion value.

token_location.description: Specifies whether this currency’s symbol appears to the “left” or “right” of the numeric amount.

decimal_token.description: Symbol used as the decimal separator in this currency.

thousands_token.description: Symbol used as the thousands separator in this currency.

decimal_places.description: Number of decimal places to show for this currency.

enabled.description: If the currency is active on the store.

get.description: Returns a list of all store *Currency*.

post.description:
Creates *Currency*.

**Required Fields** 

* country_iso2
* currency_code
* currency_exchange_rate
* auto_update
* token_location
* token
* decimal_token
* thousands_token
* decimal_places

**Read-Only Fields**

* id
* is_default
* date_created
* date_modified


The `is_default` property cannot be set programmatically. To change the store's default currency via the BigCommerce control panel, please see [Managing Currencies](https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Managing-Currencies/?q=currency&l=en_US&fs=Search&pn=1#default).

* is_default
* date_created
* date_modified
* location
* currency_code
